name: Opera Mister Wong Bookmarks Manager
tagline: Managing Opera and Mister Wong bookmarks
body:
This project provides Xtext 2.0 based parsers for the opera address file as well as the export format of Mister Wong. The goal is, to synchronize bookmark descriptions between my Mister Wong account and my locally used bookmarks in the Opera browser. 

Another feature is the generation of Wiki mark up out of the bookmark descriptions.

![Xtext editors](https://github.com/joergreichert/OperaMisterWongBookmarks/raw/master/wiki/xtext_editors.png)

![Forms Editor](https://github.com/joergreichert/OperaMisterWongBookmarks/raw/master/wiki/forms.png)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
